name: chesto-berry
effect: Held in battle : When the holder is asleep, it consumes this item to wake up. Used on a party Pokémon : Cures sleep.
short_effect: Held: Consumed when asleep to cure sleep.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A Poffin ingredient. It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from sleep.
flavor_text.platinum: A Poffin ingredient. It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from sleep.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: It may be used or held by a Pokémon to recover from sleep.
